name: UpdateGcpScanOptions
description:
Update scan options for a GCP project in Datadog.

Use this tool to update the agentless scanning options for an activated Google Cloud Platform project in Datadog. It should be called when changes to the existing scan configuration are needed.

parameters.name: gcp_project_id
parameters.description: The Google Cloud Platform project ID to update scan options for.

parameters.name: google_cloud_project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the GCP project to update scan options for, used as an identifier.

parameters.name: gcp_scan_options_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the GCP scan options resource type, typically set to 'gcp_scan_options'.

parameters.name: enable_container_vulnerability_scanning
parameters.description: Enable (True) or disable (False) scanning for vulnerabilities in containers.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in containers is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_host_vulnerability_scanning
parameters.description: Indicate if scanning for vulnerabilities in host operating systems is enabled.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.
